trans-unit.source: Specifies the access control rights that can be applied to named system event objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以套用至的存取控制權限具名系統事件物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the EventWaitHandleRights enumeration to specify access control rights when you create <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule> objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定存取控制權限，當您建立使用 EventWaitHandleRights 列舉<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule>物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: To apply access rights to a named system event, first add <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule> objects to an <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> object, then attach the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> object to the named system event using the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Threading.EventResetMode%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%40%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor or the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用到具名的系統事件的存取權限，請先新增<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule>物件加入至<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>物件，然後附加<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>具名的系統事件使用的物件<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Threading.EventResetMode%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%40%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式或<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Threading.EventResetMode%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%40%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Security on synchronization objects is not supported for Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支援同步處理物件的安全性。

trans-unit.source: The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a named event.
trans-unit.target: 變更安全性和稽核規則的具名事件相關聯的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to delete a named event.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除的具名的事件權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to exert full control over a named event, and to modify its access rules and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 執行權具名事件的完整控制權和修改其存取規則和稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The right to set or reset the signaled state of a named event.
trans-unit.target: 設定或重設收到信號的狀態的具名事件的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to open and copy the access rules and audit rules for a named event.
trans-unit.target: 具名事件規則來開啟及複製的存取規則，稽核的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to wait on a named event.
The right to change the owner of a named event.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更具名事件的擁有者權限。
